unnormalised: Electoral reforms are crucial for strengthening Indian democracy. Consider proportional representation alongside our current First-Past-the-Post system. Enhancing voter awareness campaigns, especially during festivals like Onam in Kerala, can boost participation. Reforms addressing campaign finance transparency, perhaps through stricter limits and disclosure requirements, are also needed. The Election Commission of India's role is vital in this process.
